dcterms:creator: N. X. R. Wang
D. Mahajan
M. Danilevsky
S. Rosenthal
dcterms:description: The SEMTABFACT dataset consists of statements and tables from scientific literature, designed for the task of statement verification and evidence finding. It includes entailed, neutral, and refuted statements, with a focus on complex reasoning over tabular data.
dcterms:title: SEMTABFACT

dcterms:creator: W. Chen
H. Wang
J. Chen
Y. Zhang
H. Wang
S. Li
X. Zhou
W. Y. Wang
dcterms:description: TABFACT is a large-scale dataset for table-based fact verification, where the task is to determine whether a statement is entailed or refuted based on the information contained in tables.
dcterms:title: TABFACT

dcterms:creator: V. Gupta
M. Mehta
P. Nokhiz
V. Srikumar
dcterms:description: INFOTABS is a dataset designed for inference on tables as semi-structured data, focusing on reasoning tasks that involve extracting and manipulating information from tabular formats.
dcterms:title: INFOTABS

dcterms:creator: M. Iyyer
W.-t. Yih
M.-W. Chang
dcterms:description: SQA is a dataset for sequential question answering, where the task involves answering questions based on a sequence of statements or information.
dcterms:title: SQA
